articles.title: Adani Wilmar buys several brands to strengthen food business

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India sets end-June coal import targets as power woes mount
articles.description: India has asked state and private sector utilities to ensure delivery of 19 million tonnes of coal from overseas by end-June, according to a power ministry letter, reflecting an urgency to secure supplies in a pricey market amid increasing blackouts.
articles.content: India sets end-June coal import targets as power woes mount
